head.citation-title: Impact of HY as an additive in Pd/HBETA catalyst on waste tire pyrolysis products
head.abstracts: The addition of HY as a zeolite additive into Pd/HBETA used in the catalytic pyrolysis of waste tire was studied. Due to the different porosity and acid properties of the two zeolites, HY was used as the additive in the main catalyst to improve the cracking performance and the quality of oil product. The HY as a catalyst itself could improve the quality and quantity of oil product in the range of naphtha fraction. After adding HY as the additive in Pd/HBETA, the quality and quantity of light gas oil fraction were improved with increasing saturated hydrocarbons in this fraction. Moreover, the light olefins production was gradually enhanced when the HY was added in Pd/HBETA. The nature of HY and pore specific volume were two important factors influencing the products. This is an abstract of a paper presented at the CHISA 2012 - 20th International Congress of Chemical and Process Engineering and PRES 2012 - 15th Conference PRES (Prague, Czech Republic 8/25-29/2012).
